subclusters.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and SASP-Driven Immunosenescence Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Mediated Inflammation Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence-associated secretory phenotype (SASP) driving inflammation via p38 MAPK and inflammatory mediator secretion.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage and SASP-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes DNA damage-induced senescence and SASP secretion as drivers of aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and SASP-Driven Immunosenescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Centers on senescent immune cells, especially T cells, SASP secretion, and immune dysfunction in aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Immune Cell Senescence and SASP-Driven Immunosenescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on NK cell dysfunction, senescent cell clearance failure, and SASP-driven inflammaging in immune aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: miRNA-Regulated SASP and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights miR-570-3p regulation of sirtuin-1 affecting SASP and senescence under oxidative stress.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Autophagy Decline and Cellular Senescence in Tissue Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links autophagy decline to cellular senescence and tissue dysfunction, especially in cartilage aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: mTOR Pathway-Regulated SASP and Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes mTOR signaling promoting SASP and geroconversion in senescent cells driving aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Driven Senescence in Osteo-Articular Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cell accumulation and SASP causing osteo-articular diseases and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Species-Specific Senescence Transcriptome and ROS-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Discusses ROS and telomere dynamics influencing senescence contribution to aging across species.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP and DNA Damage-Driven Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes DNA damage-induced senescence and SASP secretion contributing to systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Core Program and SASP Heterogeneity in Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes diverse senescence triggers converging on a core program with SASP heterogeneity and paracrine effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Driven Senescence in Age-Related Osteoporosis Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cell accumulation and SASP causing osteoporosis and tissue dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescent Cell Antigen and Immune Clearance Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes molecular changes generating senescent cell antigen (SCA) triggering immune-mediated clearance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage-Induced ROS and Metabolic Changes Leading to Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on persistent DNA damage causing ROS production via metabolic pathway activation inducing senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Induced Inflamed Niche and Regenerative Decline Cellular Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes SASP creating inflamed tissue niches that impair regeneration and spread senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p16INK4a-Associated SASP and Cellular Senescence Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes p16INK4a as a biomarker and effector of senescence with SASP driving systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Mediated MDSC Recruitment and Immunosuppression in Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SASP recruiting myeloid-derived suppressor cells (MDSCs) causing immunosuppression and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage Response and SASP in Senescence and Cancer Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes DNA damage response pathways inducing senescence and SASP with dual roles in cancer and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p21high Cell Population and SASP Heterogeneity in Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p21high senescent cells as a distinct population contributing to aging and SASP effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p16INK4a-Mediated Klotho Downregulation and Senescence Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links p16INK4a-induced senescence to repression of anti-aging klotho gene contributing to aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: PAI-1 Regulated Senescence Signaling and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes PAI-1 as a causal regulator of senescence signaling and age-related pathologies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence-Associated Anti-Apoptosis and SASP in Muscle Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent cell anti-apoptotic pathways (SCAPs) and SASP driving skeletal muscle aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genome Instability, cGAS-STING, and p38 MAPK-Driven Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes genome instability activating cGAS-STING and p38 MAPK pathways inducing senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Cyclin-Dependent Kinase Inhibitors and SASP in Senescence Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on p16INK4a, p14ARF/p19ARF, and p21 roles in senescence induction and SASP-mediated aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p53 Pathway and SASP in Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes p53-mediated senescence and SASP with dual roles in cancer suppression and aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Driven Bystander Senescence and Stem Cell Dysfunction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights SASP-mediated spread of senescence and stem cell dysfunction driving systemic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DNA Damage Response, miRNA, and SASP in Inflammaging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DDR activation, SASP secretion, and miRNA-mediated propagation of inflammaging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Pak2 Kinase and HIRA-Mediated Chromatin Remodeling in Senescence Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes Pak2 regulation of HIRA-mediated nucleosome assembly controlling senescence gene expression.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: SASP-Induced CD38+ Macrophage Activation and NAD Decline Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on SASP-driven macrophage polarization causing NAD+ decline linking senescence to metabolic aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence in Post-Mitotic Cells and SASP in Neurodegeneration Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes senescence-like phenotype and SASP in neurons contributing to brain aging and dysfunction.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Genetic Regulation of Cellular Senescence and Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on genetic complementation groups and senescence-related genes controlling replicative senescence.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: p16INK4a Genetic Variation and Cellular Senescence Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links genetic polymorphisms in p16INK4a locus to senescence regulation and physical aging phenotypes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: RNase-L Mediated Cellular Senescence and Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes RNase-L activation inducing senescence and its impact on organismal aging and lifespan.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Senescence and SASP in Cancer and Aging Therapy Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescence as tumor suppressor and SASP's dual role in cancer and aging pathologies.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Virus-Induced Senescence via cGAS-STING and SASP Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes viral infection triggering senescence through cGAS-STING and SASP contributing to aging.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Fat Tissue Senescence and SASP-Driven Metabolic Dysfunction Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on senescent fat cells accumulating with age, secreting SASP, and causing metabolic aging.
